summary:
Ask Me Anything #4
  

This morning I was feeling down again from the events of the week.  The other day I had posited a new post or page where I rid my mind of all my angst: What I'm afraid of.  I say "post or page" because the thought of answering that daunting question in a single post might mean I never finish it to publish, or at least not in time for Writing Month or WeblogPoMoAMA...
title: Ask Me Anything #4

summary:
Squid-A-Rama will be in Des Moines at the end of the month. 
Visitors will be able to dissect squid, explore fascinating facts about the species, and witness a live squid release conducted by local divers. 
How are they doing a live squid release...
title: Friday Squid Blogging: Squid-A-Rama in Des Moines

summary: In college, I was a Fiction Writing major.  I wouldn't say this was, like, the smartest decision I ever made in life, but I had spent literal years farting around in art school[1], jumping from major to major to major until I finally, mercifully settled on the one that would be printed on my degree.  Fiction Writing wasn't accompanied by a ton of perks...
